How ASAE
Serves You
Tbe ASAE Library
In ASAE’s Association Management Library,
which is unique in the world, members have
access to 40,000 catalogued items on all phases
of association management. In addition, there
are more than 350 other formal publications.
Through the library’s loan system, these spe¬
cial publications, books, reprints, brochures and
pamphlets are readily available to members.
Tbe ASAE Directory
One of the most valuable publications of
ASAE is its membership directory, “Who's Who
in Association Management”—valuable because
it is sought by key decision-makers in business,
the professions and government. This exclusive
roster is available to all members at no charge.
Tbe Convention Liaison Committee
ASAE is one of the supporting groups of
the Convention Liaison Committee, a tripartite
organization consisting of representatives of as¬
sociations, hotels and convention bureaus. The
Committee works continually to develop better
ways to conduct successful group meetings. The
Convention Liaison Manual, published by the
Committee, is accepted as the outstanding guide
book for meetings and conventions. It is avail¬
able through ASAE.
